short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Translate, simplify, explain, and summarize words, sentences, and paragraphs into easy-to-read language!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
➤ How it works

- As you browse the web, select text you don't quite understand, and click the Rewordo button.
A simplification, explanation, summary, or translation will appear in the side panel, depending on your selected mode.

- Works for both web pages and PDF's.

- Output language and simplify/summarize/explain settings can be selected in the extension pop-up, or in the side panel.

Other settings include:
- Disable Rewordo for your selected websites.
- Enable/disable selection auto-complete for partially selected words.


➤ Whats included?

- Free
Includes all Rewordo features, with a limit of 10 Rewordo requests every 3 hours.

- Premium
Rewordo Premium removes all request limits.


➤ Your data

- We only gather data related to your text translations, and data necessary for enabling login authentication.
